attributes.action: Scrap all Death Duties (inheritance tax etc) for persons who donate their organs after death
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a person donates his or her organs which then allows a person or persons to have a greatly enhanced quality of life, then all taxes created due to that persons death be written off by the Government, as a way of saying thanks to the donor and those grieving for that person.
